name: Snowpocalypse (mahahahajan, JohnChambers, Peyton Rodgers, bloopyturtle)
description:
A gamelet about enduring the Texas Blizzard / Snowvid. An unprepared college student tries to make it through several days without power or running water. At least you'll always have your cats.

Five potential endings!

  • Pulkit Mahajan - Programmer
  • Peyton Rodgers - Artist
  • John Chambers - Composer / Sound Designer
  • Olivia Elmers - Writer
